programme.title: Holiday in San Francisco
programme.short_synopsis: Cooke visits San Francisco, his honeymoon destination during the Alcatraz mutiny of 1946.
programme.medium_synopsis: Cooke visits San Francisco, where he spent his honeymoon during the Alcatraz mutiny of 1946, and the destination of a recent visit by French President Mitterrand.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
